reblog.comment:
Hey everyone! Just wanted to let you all know that I will be attending Other World Comic Con, which will be going on September 26-27 at the North Island Center in Aurora, IL. I will have a table in artist alley as well as a panel in which I will be having a Q&A.  The questions can range from being Erma-related to any other type and I will answer them the best I can and not sound awkward while doing so. Nope.

Also, I will be having Erma prints that are exclusive to the Con that will be free for the first 50 people who arrive to the panel, autographed and all.  Tickets for the panel will be $10 and will go on for this week so definitely get one while you can. I will post more info such as what time this will be taken place hopefully soon throughout this month.

Here are two links to find out how to get a ticket:
http://rottenapplecomics.com/
https://www.facebook.com/Otherworldcon

If you guys are in the Illinois area or are looking for a con to go to, definitely come on by, as this is one that I have been supporting. Either way, I cannot wait to meet you all there.

reblog.comment:
Erma- Next Round

It’s been quite the adventure this year working on this series, but it’s only the beginning. Thank you all for sticking around for this long and look out for more for the next coming year. Have a Happy New Year, guys, and be sure to stay safe.

Take care.

reblog.comment:
Hey guys! Just in case you haven’t heard already, Erma is now on Tapastic! Not to worry, posts will go on as usual, but I figured to give you all another method of checking out the strips. Plus, I have noticed that it was getting difficult for some people to read them all chronologically and since this lists strips in order, it only made sense to post Erma here too. Hope that helps and enjoy, as always.


Link: http://tapastic.com/episode/255222

reblog.comment:
Happy Halloween everyone and thanks for tuning in for this specially scheduled month. In fact, thank you all for always tuning in. It really is what keeps me going with this series and heading forward to even greater things with it.

Speaking of which, I have a lot of plans that are in the works for Erma, so expect to see some previews or updates sooner or later.

Once again, thank you all for the constant support and have a safe Halloween.

reblog.comment: Hey everyone! Hope you all had an awesome start of the week….. hopefully. Anyways, for those who are keeping up to date on what’s been going on, I hinted back maybe a month ago that Book 2 was being worked on. Well, I am glad to announce that it pretty close to completion. I can’t say much right now about the little details, but one thing I can definitely say is that the comic will consist of all original pages and strips for its own. Since a lot of you guys liked the addition of the exclusive content for the last issue, I figure it would be pretty sweet to give you guys even more new original content. That’s all I can say for now, but be sure to stay tuned for more news coming soon. Hope you’re excited for this because I definitely am.

reblog.comment:
Hey guys. Usually around Tuesdays, I would post a preview of tomorrow’s Erma comic on my social media sites. However, as some may have noticed, the usual weekend strip was not posted recently. Long story short, there were some technical issues on my side and some schedule difficulties with finals at college and all. I had meant to post this to coincide with both the Krampus movie and the celebratory festival going on around the folklore. Not to worry, the usual Erma comic will be posted tomorrow as of every Wednesday. Despite the finals, that does not give me the excuse to skip out on the next weekends to come. So I’ll make sure that the strips will be coming out as usually scheduled.

Thanks guys, for sticking with me for this long and for those doing their finals, I wish you the best of luck.

- Brandon

reblog.comment: Just had to do a college project based on making a movie trailer in comic book form, so I figured “why not do one on Erma?”  Figured it would be fun to do.  So enjoy and I’ll be back with another preview to the next comic some time soon.

reblog.comment:
Thank you all so much. We’ve just reached over 20,000 followers. It’s been a pretty crazy thing getting up to this point and without all of you supporting and spreading the word about Erma and just my work in general, I don’t know what I would have been doing by now. But, of course, we need to keep going, as do I with my posts. There’s been plenty of behind-the-scenes that I am getting ready for you guys that I’ve been hinting at. so I hope you’re just as excited for them as I am. Once again, from me to you, thank you all so much.
Bye.

reblog.comment:
SPECIAL ANNOUNCEMENT!! 

Hey guys! So I have a special little announcement for you. On Monday, August 10th, the Erma books will finally be available to purchase online. It has taken a while to get this done, but they will finally be on the website Monday.

And as a BONUS, since you guys have been so supportive spreading the word and helping Erma grow, I’ve wanted to give something back.

SO FOR THE FIRST 100 PEOPLE TO BUY A BOOK, THERE WILL BE A SPECIAL LITTLE SKETCH CARD THAT WILL BE PERSONALLY HAND DRAWN AND AUTOGRAPHED BY ME FOR EACH.

The books will $5 plus shipping via PayPal. It should work for both PayPal and Credit Card, but if there are any problems, let me know so we’ll be able to fix it.

Also, go ahead and check out the newly rebuilt website, in the meantime, right here: http://www.bjsincorporated.com/

I’ll be posting more stuff in the future such as new web comics, videos, and much more.

reblog.comment:
Hey guys. Just a QUICK UPDATE. Since this week is the last in my college semester, things have of course been busy. However, thankfully, I was able to do an Erma strip for one of the projects. So for this Wednesday, I’ll post it up for you guys since I won’t have time this week to continue the pet story.

Not to worry, once this week is done I will be continuing the story next week as well as have a possible update on the book. Take care.

reblog.comment:
Hey Guys! Just wanted to remind you that I’ll be at G-Fest this weekend! 

If anyone is in the neighborhood or visiting G-Fest, come on by the artist alley!  I’ll be doing commissions and selling prints along with the finally printed Erma books. I’d love to meet you guys!

For those who are wondering when the books will be sold online, they will be soon after G-Fest. I am very sorry that it took this long to finally have them ready, but they are finally here.

Here’s the info for the location and schedule for the fest:

Crowne Plaza Chicago O’Hare - 5440 N River Rd, Rosemont, IL 60018

Friday- 10 AM - 5 PM

Saturday- 9 AM - 5 PM

Sunday- 9 AM - 1:30 PM

reblog.comment:
We’ve just reached 9,000 followers. Thank you guys so much! Just knowing the fact that there’s that many of you still checking out my stuff is literally just mind blowing! I know that might sound overdone, but I truly mean it.
But let’s keep this going. The more the merrier. Heck, if I have the time, I’ll make something special for the 10,000 mark.

In the mean time, I’m gonna get back to working on this Erma book. Take care guys.

reblog.comment:
OVER 10,000 FOLLOWERS!

That’s insane! Thank you all so much! For the word of mouth and just helping these comics grow! It just warms my heart that this many people would stick around to follow something that I’d be dedicated to.  But this isn’t even close to the halfway point, let’s keep going!

For those who are new, I do a weekly horror-comedy web comic called Erma.  I post one up every Wednesday and tend to possibly post up fan art and other comics such as my superhero series, My Life, throughout the week. I am right now in the works of an Erma book which should be ready very soon so stick around for that. I am also currently in college which then follows to my quick update.

Right now, it’s the end of the semester which usually means it’s that crazy and busy time of the school year again. First to get off the back, THERE WILL STILL BE NEW ERMA STRIPS ON WEDNESDAYS ALONG WITH BOOK UPDATES. I’ll just be too busy as of right now to post anything else until the semester ends which should be around May 8th. I just wanted to get this out just in case you guys are wondering why I haven’t posted a lot lately. But when Summer time comes, I’ll be posting way more for you guys.

So thank you all so much for following me and there’s MORE stuff to come in the FUTURE. Take care.

reblog.comment:
EXTRA COMIC!! AND IN COLOR!!! Note: This will probably be a rarity unless the strip requires color.

Erma- Splatter House

ALSO, UPDATE!!!

So it’s been a quite a bit since I’ve had an update on the book, but I’m betting some of you guys are wondering what’s happening with it.  So I’ll just get to the elephant in the room.  It has definitely taken a bit to get this book out, but I assure you guys that it is close to being finished.  I had finally finished up a couple of comic jobs and re-arranged some of the pages just yesterday.  So when the printing starts, I will have a special little announcement.

Also, as far as conventions go, I will be attending at G-Fest which is a convention that celebrates giant monsters such as Godzilla, King Kong, Gamera, and many more.  I will be selling Godzilla-related prints as well as the Erma books while I also do commissions.  If you’re in the area or are visiting, definitely come by the table.  The convention will be opened from July 10th - 12th at Crowne Plaza Chicago O’Hare in Rosemont, IL.  I would love to meet you guys.

I’ll update you guys more on future things to come soon.  Take care.

So it’s been a quite a bit since I’ve had an update on the book, but I’m betting some of you guys are wondering what’s happening with it.  So I’ll just get to the elephant in the room.  It has definitely taken a bit to get this book out, but I assure you guys that it is close to being finished.  I had finally finished up a couple of comic jobs and re-arranged some of the pages just yesterday.  So when the printing starts, I will have a special little announcement.

Also, as far as conventions go, I will be attending at G-Fest which is a convention that celebrates giant monsters such as Godzilla, King Kong, Gamera, and many more.  I will be selling Godzilla-related prints as well as the Erma books while I also do commissions.  If you’re in the area or are visiting, definitely come by the table.  The convention will be opened from July 10th - 12th at Crowne Plaza Chicago O’Hare in Rosemont, IL.  I would love to meet you guys.

I’ll update you guys more on future things to come soon.  Take care.

summary: EXTRA COMIC!! AND IN COLOR!!! Note: This will probably be a rarity unless the strip requires color. Erma- Splatter House ALSO,...
caption:
EXTRA COMIC!! AND IN COLOR!!! Note: This will probably be a rarity unless the strip requires color.

Erma- Splatter House

ALSO, UPDATE!!!

So it’s been a quite a bit since I’ve had an update on the book, but I’m betting some of you guys are wondering what’s happening with it.  So I’ll just get to the elephant in the room.  It has definitely taken a bit to get this book out, but I assure you guys that it is close to being finished.  I had finally finished up a couple of comic jobs and re-arranged some of the pages just yesterday.  So when the printing starts, I will have a special little announcement.

Also, as far as conventions go, I will be attending at G-Fest which is a convention that celebrates giant monsters such as Godzilla, King Kong, Gamera, and many more.  I will be selling Godzilla-related prints as well as the Erma books while I also do commissions.  If you’re in the area or are visiting, definitely come by the table.  The convention will be opened from July 10th - 12th at Crowne Plaza Chicago O’Hare in Rosemont, IL.  I would love to meet you guys.

I’ll update you guys more on future things to come soon.  Take care.

reblog.comment: Hey everyone! Got a little special announcement! Since you guys have been such awesome fans throughout this year, I figured to do something special for October. So, beginning this Friday, I will be posting 2 comic pages a week. They will be posted on Wednesdays and Fridays as well as 2 weekend strips up to Halloween as we follow a night of Erma and her pals trick-or-treating. Hope you guys are up for the ride, but other than that, have a great day!
